Text: PJM West Implementation Delay to March Cc PST Transmission Customers Since FERC did not act on our September PJM West compliance filing Docket No RT at its December th meeting Allegheny Power AP will need to delay the start of the PJM West arrangement until March In order to accommodate the further delay in the start date AP will need to sell transmission service under the AP OATT and on the AP OASIS for the month of February To accomplish this AP will do the following AP will attempt to call the Transmission Customers that have confirmed pointtopoint transmission service reservations on the PJM OASIS for the paths that are not currently valid for PJM AEP and DLCO by pm on December to determine if they need comparable service on the AP system If that is the case AP will honor the confirmed reservations and the PJM OASIS timestamps Yearly service that was not given the option to exercise rollover rights on the PJM paths AP to PJM and PJM to AP will be given the option to extend that service through the month of February AP will attempt to call these Transmission Customers by pm on December ATCs for the month of February will be uploaded to the AP OASIS starting at am on December The upload will include all valid AP paths AEP PJM VAP FE and DLCO Transmission Marketing will post a message on the OASIS when the ATC upload is started and when it is complete Transmission service beyond March will continue to be sold by PJM per the Interim Coordination Agreement that was filed with FERC on February January is the last scheduled FERC meeting in January If FERC does not act on our filing at that time the start of the PJM West arrangement may then be delayed until April Further information will be provided at that time if necessary AP regrets any inconvenience that this delay may have caused you AP will continue to keep you uptodate on the implementation of PJM West AP has requested that FERC issue an effective date of the first day of the calendar month which begins at least thirty days after the date on which FERC issues an order If you have any additional questions or concerns please call me at or the Transmission Marketers at Terri J Grabiak General Manager Transmission Marketing Allegheny Power

FW pjmmiwg PJM and PJM West ATC OASIS PostingsPlease note the information below concerning PJM and PJM West ATC OASIS postings Terri J Grabiak General Manager Transmission Marketing Allegheny Power Cabin Hill Drive Room B Greensburg PA fax mailto Original Message From mailto Sent Monday August PM To Subject pjmmiwg PJM and PJM West ATC OASIS Postings As promised at last weeks meeting here a followup to the current and proposed PJM and PJM West ATC OASIS postings Currently the ATC evaluation is being performed at PJM with consultation of Allegheney Power The determination being performed is for PJM and PJM WEST paths as they would exist after December The coordinated ATC values for service beyond December are being divided between PJM and AP with each portion being posted on the respective OASIS The paths between PJM and AP and between AP and PJM are being posted as zero It is intended that all PJM and PJM WEST transmission service beginning January and beyond be posted and requested on the PJM OASIS as soon as possible The most probable date for the transition to full posting on the PJM OASIS site would be Monday October coincident with the PJM Monthly Transmission Service postings It would be hard at this time to imagine overcoming the remaining necessary infrastructure changes in time to meet the PJM Monthly posting date of September Once the transition to a single OASIS takes place the January and beyond postings will be zero on the AP OASIS All AP OASIS existing transmission service for January and beyond will be converted to the PJM OASIS maintaining the original service request date and time If you have any questions please dont hesitate to call or email Bob Moore Opinions expressed in this email are those of the originating sender not those of the PJM Interconnection LLC The information transmitted is intended only for the individuals to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipients is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer To unsubscribe from this list send an email to containing only the following line in the body of the email unsubscribe pjmmiwg
